T02D2154:249a-1: shr'i badzra p'a ni n'i l'am ba ra dha ra ba lim dh'a ra ni bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2154:249a-3: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2154:249a-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2154:249a-6: bar chod spong dang dug zhi phyir //
T02D2154:249a-7: thugs rje can la gus btud de //
T02D2154:249a-8: gtor ma'i las 'di brtsam par bya //
T02D2154:249a-9: dad ldan byang sems rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2154:249a-10: ser sna med cing gtong brtson pas //
T02D2154:249a-11: bza' ba bca' ba 'jib dang btung //
T02D2154:249a-12: rin chen snod du rab tu bsham //
T02D2154:249a-13: h'um hr'i:aom gyis byin brlab bya //
T02D2154:249a-14: bdud rtsi sha lnga ci 'byor pa //
T02D2154:249b-1: sngo dang dmar ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis //
T02D2154:249b-2: de steng aa las ka p'a la /
T02D2154:249b-3: lcags kyu lnga dang sa bon lnga //
T02D2154:249b-4: de nas mdun gyi bar snang la //
T02D2154:249b-5: zla dkyil steng na yi ge h'um //
T02D2154:249b-6: de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can //
T02D2154:249b-7: sngo bskyod me 'bar rdzas rnams khol //
T02D2154:249b-8: 'od kyis zla ba rdo rje zhu //
T02D2154:249b-9: thim pas dngul chu lta bur gnas //
T02D2154:249b-10: nge yi steng du aom dkar po'i //
T02D2154:249b-11: 'od kyis gangg'a'i glung sogs bkug / bdud rtsi drangs te gnyis med bstim //
T02D2154:249b-12: 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin brlab bya //
T02D2154:249b-13: de rjes mdun gyi mkha' stong la //
T02D2154:249b-14: pam las chu skyes 'dab brgyad bskyed //
T02D2154:249b-15: de dbus h'um las 'dod lha bskyed //
T02D2154:249b-16: lte 'khor dag la aom las ni //
T02D2154:249b-17: phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi yang bskyed //
T02D2154:249b-18: 'dab ma mtshams bzhir khro mo ste //
T02D2154:249b-19: gong ras sgo ba bzhi po'o //
T02D2154:249b-20: dmar ba'i sa bon 'dab brgyad dmar //
T02D2154:249b-22: ze 'bru bcu drug sna tshogs la //
T02D2154:249b-23: bdud dang gnod sbyin sna tshogs bskyed //
T02D2154:249b-24: rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis ni //
T02D2154:249b-26: bye snyed dkyil 'khor lha la bstim //
T02D2154:249b-27: klu dang gnod sbyin bdud dang ni //
T02D2154:249b-29: thams cad de gsum dag la /
T02D2154:249b-31: spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur te //
T02D2154:249b-32: sku dang gsung dang thugs lhar gyur //
T02D2154:249b-33: mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod //
T02D2154:249b-34: sangs rgyas rnams dang mgron rnams kyi //
T02D2154:249b-35: rang rang lce la rdo rje ni //
T02D2154:249b-36: h'um las nas tshad tsam ni bskyed //
T02D2154:249b-37: rtse mo dag la aom bsams te //
T02D2154:249b-39: gnyis med ye shes thob 'gyur te ;
T02D2154:249b-40: / nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyi mchod //
T02D2154:249b-41: gtso bo nyid la gtso bo ste //
T02D2154:249b-42: 'khor ni so so'i sngags rim bzhin //
T02D2154:249b-43: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpanna tv'at /
T02D2154:249b-44: gnyis la sbyin pa gong dang 'brel //
T02D2154:249b-45: de nas bstod cing gsos ba gdab //
T02D2154:249b-46: so so yi ni sngags kyis ni //
T02D2154:249b-47: rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol //
T02D2154:249b-48: spyod lam gyi ni dus dag tu //
T02D2154:249b-49: rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya //
T02D2154:249b-50: 'di yis pan dang bsod nams ci bsags pa //
T02D2154:249b-51: 'bras bu myur zhing longs spyod rnams ni thob //
T02D2154:249b-52: bgegs rnams zhi dang gdug pa zhi byed shog /
T02D2154:249b-53: bde ba mchog chen bdag gis thob par shog /
T02D2154:249b-54: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi
T02D2154:249b-55: gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba nam
T02D2154:249b-56: gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa /
T02D2154:249b-57: slob dpon chen po bram ze'i btsun pa dz'a ba ri ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2154:249b-59: // / bla ma de ba p'u rna ma ti dang /
T02D2154:249b-60: lo ts'a ba she'u badzra de bas bsgyur ba las /
T02D2154:249b-61: slad kyi bdag dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bla ma la shin tu legs par zhus te /
